# 

*  [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/download/) Node.js  npmhexo  Node.js v0.6  Node.js
* node,
```bash
node -v
```
* 
```bash
npm config set registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org
// 
npm config get registry
// npm info express
```

* hexohexo

```bash
npm i -g hexo-cli
npm i -g hexo
```

* 

> 1 help  
  2 init []  hexo
  3 version  hexo
  4 --config config-path _config.yml
  5 --cwd cwd-path 
  5 --debug 
  6 --safe 
  7 --silent 
  8 generate 
  9 clean 
  10server 
  11deploy 

# 

```bash
hexo init myBlog
```



# 

source/_posts/start.md

```bash
hexo new "start"  #,start
```

```bash
  ---
  title: 
  date: 2017-04-08 12:11:50
  tags: hexo
  ---
```
---

# 

Hexo, hexo, Hexo, , [themes](https://hexo.io/themes/)


```bash
git clone https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next themes/next

#./_config.ymlnext
theme: writing

#
hexo g       #hexo generate
hexo s       #hexo server
```
[next](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/)

# github
deploy
```bash
# Deployment
## Docs: https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html
deploy:
  type: git
  repository: https://github.com/sakitam-fdd/sakitam-fdd.github.io.git
```

Post.title: travis
Post._content:
# 

  


<!--more-->

# 

## Webhook

  Webhook Webhook  Github 
githubgitlabwebhook
   ``push`` webhook
 ``git`` 
  
  
## Travis CI

  Travis CI githubTravis CI

### travis

 - travis
 
 ![](http://oo4em1zi0.bkt.clouddn.com/website/images/travisgitres.jpg)
 ![](http://oo4em1zi0.bkt.clouddn.com/website/images/travismenu.jpg)
 
 - Environment VariablesHEXO_ALGOLIA_INDEXING_KEY(algoliakey)TRAVIS_GITHUBGithubAccess Token
   
   
 -  ``.travis.yml`` , nodehexoalgolia `push`
    ``github`` 
 
  ```bash
    language: node_js
    node_js: node
    cache:
      directories:
        - node_modules
    before_install:
    - npm install -g hexo-cli
    install: npm install
    script:
    - git clone https://github.com/sakitam-fdd/hexo-theme-next.git themes/next
    - hexo clean
    - hexo generate
    - export HEXO_ALGOLIA_INDEXING_KEY=${HEXO_ALGOLIA_INDEXING_KEY}
    - hexo algolia
    after_script:
    - cd ./dist
    - git init
    - git config --global user.name 'sakitam-fdd'
    - git config --global user.email 'smilefdd@gmail.com'
    - git add .
    - git commit -m "update my website"
    - git push --force --quiet "https://${TRAVIS_GITHUB}@github.com/sakitam-fdd/sakitam-fdd.github.io" master:master
  ```
  

## 

   ``website``  [travis-ci](https://www.travis-ci.org/sakitam-fdd/website)
 ``Done. Your build exited with 0.``blogblog

![](http://oo4em1zi0.bkt.clouddn.com/website/images/travistravis.jpg)

    ``github`` 
 
  ```bash
    language: node_js
    node_js: node
    cache:
      directories:
        - node_modules
    before_install:
    - npm install -g hexo-cli
    install: npm install
    script:
    - git clone https://github.com/sakitam-fdd/hexo-theme-next.git themes/next
    - hexo clean
    - hexo generate
    - export HEXO_ALGOLIA_INDEXING_KEY=${HEXO_ALGOLIA_INDEXING_KEY}
    - hexo algolia
    after_script:
    - cd ./dist
    - git init
    - git config --global user.name 'sakitam-fdd'
    - git config --global user.email 'smilefdd@gmail.com'
    - git add .
    - git commit -m "update my website"
    - git push --force --quiet "https://${TRAVIS_GITHUB}@github.com/sakitam-fdd/sakitam-fdd.github.io" master:master
  ```

Post._content:
# 

deepinnodejswebstormjdk,git

<!--more-->

# nodejs

> 

* https://nodejs.org/en/download/Source Code
```bash
wget https://nodejs.org/dist/v8.9.3/node-v8.9.3.tar.gz
```

* 
```bash
// 
sudo tar xvf node-v8.9.3.tar.gz

// 
cd node-v8.9.3

// 20
sudo ./configure 
sudo make 
sudo make install 

// Node 
node -v 
v8.9.3

// NPM
npm -v
5.5.1
```

# git

```bash
Debian/Ubuntu
For the latest stable version for your release of Debian/Ubuntu

# apt-get install git
For Ubuntu, this PPA provides the latest stable upstream Git version

# add-apt-repository ppa:git-core/ppa # apt update; apt install git
Fedora
# yum install git (up to Fedora 21)
# dnf install git (Fedora 22 and later)
Gentoo
# emerge --ask --verbose dev-vcs/git
Arch Linux
# pacman -S git
openSUSE
# zypper install git
Mageia
# urpmi git
Nix/NixOS
# nix-env -i git
FreeBSD
# pkg install git
Solaris 9/10/11 (OpenCSW)
# pkgutil -i git
Solaris 11 Express
# pkg install developer/versioning/git
OpenBSD
# pkg_add git
Alpine
$ apk add git
```

# JDK

```bash
Oracle JDK
JDKtar.gz




cd ~/Download
tar.gz

tar -zxvf jdk-8u152-linux-x64.tar.gz
JDK

sudo mv jdk1.8.0_152/  /usr/lib/jvm/jdk1.8.0_152

JDK

sudo vim /etc/profile
```



```bash
JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/jdk1.8.0_152
export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH 
export CLASSPATH=.:$JAVA_HOME/lib/dt.jar:$JAVA_HOME/lib/tools.jar
```

jdk



```bash
source /etc/profile
```


JDK
java
shellupdate-alternatives

```bash
sudo update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/javac javac  /usr/lib/jvm/jdk1.8.0_152/bin/javac  1171
sudo update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/java  java  /usr/lib/jvm/jdk1.8.0_152/bin/java  1171
sudo update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/jar jar /usr/lib/jvm/jdk1.8.0_152/bin/jar 1171   
sudo update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/javah javah /usr/lib/jvm/jdk1.8.0_152/bin/javah 1171   
sudo update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/javap javap /usr/lib/jvm/jdk1.8.0_152/bin/javap 1171 
```

update-alternativesubuntu1171

JAVA

```bash
update-alternatives --display java
```

JAVA


```angular2html
update-alternatives --config java
```



  2  java ( /usr/bin/java)

                                                     
------------------------------------------------------------
```bash
* 0            /usr/lib/jvm/jdk1.8.0_152/bin/java               1171      
  1            /usr/lib/jvm/java-8-openjdk-amd64/jre/bin/java   1081      
  2            /usr/lib/jvm/jdk1.8.0_152/bin/java               1171      
```

[*]<>

JDK 1.811711081

 


JAVA
shell

```bash
java -version
```

JDK

```bash
Picked up _JAVA_OPTIONS:   -Dawt.useSystemAAFontSettings=gasp
java version "1.8.0_152"
Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (build 1.8.0_152-b16)
Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (build 25.152-b16, mixed mode)
```

# webstorm

> http://www.jetbrains.com/webstorm/



```bash


tar zxvf WebStorm-2017.3.tar.gz


sudo mv WebStorm-173.3727.108/ /opt/WebStorm/


sudo ln -s /opt/WebStorm/ /opt/WebStorm


/opt/WebStorm/bin/webstorm.sh
Dash
```

## 

> http://www.imsxm.com/jetbrains-license-server.html
